title: Orgasms, Affairs & Sexual Stamina
itunes:title: Orgasms, Affairs & Sexual Stamina
itunes:subtitle: On today’s show, Emily’s taking calls and talking about why it’s time to stop faking orgasms and get the pleasure you deserve – as well as some tips to help you get there. She discusses why there needs to be less faking pleasure in the bedroom...
description:
On today’s show, Emily’s taking calls and talking about why it’s time to stop faking orgasms and get the pleasure you deserve – as well as some tips to help you get there.

She discusses why there needs to be less faking pleasure in the bedroom and more real satisfaction. Plus, she lends advice on what to do when you keep feeling light-headed after sex, why some men like to share their partners with other men, and whether or not a relationship can survive after a betrayal.

Thank you for supporting our sponsors who help keep the show FREE: Apex, Good Vibrations Subscription Box, SiriusXM

Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For even more sex advice, tips & tricks, visit: sexwithemily.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
